text:
Hey api'sters, your help would be much appreciated here :sweat_smile: I'm in the process of planning a Segment implementation and trying to figure out the best method of triggering 2 x HS workflows (welcome email series + onboarding series) after passing user traits as part of an identity call.

I notice this message explaining we would need an Enterprise account to pass traits from an identity call through to a track call, then as a custom event i.e. User Signed Up = YES (we have a Pro account) so I'm just trying to get ahead of the game. Is there a best practice way to go about this for Pro account users?

<https://segment.com/docs/connections/destinations/catalog/HubSpot/>
